name: nortegas-puntos
description: Sistema completo de puntos y canjes para NorteGAS

scripts.install:all: npm run install:frontend && npm run install:backend
scripts.install:backend: cd backend && python -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run setup:env
scripts.setup:env: cp frontend/.env.example frontend/.env && cp backend/.env.example backend/.env
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend

author: NorteGAS
